title: LeaverBuster for groups.
body:
I'm unsure if this is the right board for this, but it didnt seem like a GD post.

Could someone explain to me the reasoning behind locking out the entire client for ALL group members waiting to leave a low priority queue? (as shown in link)

 - It seems like a misdirected punishment for those that are innocent of dodging or leaving a game 
 - furthermore the punishment seems a bit OTT even for the leaver. The only reason I can think of is to force the guilty party examine his/her wrong doing from sheer boredom.

PS: I want to make it clear I'm not questioning the need for leaverbuster as I have lost many games to leavers. I'm sharing an opinion about an aspect of the game that i feel could be improved.
PSS: Can we get a "vote to dodge" feature in lobby? Punishing people for not wanting to lose rank before the game even started, again seems pretty needlessly harsh to and encourages toxicity in picks and bans.
